original_text: And Maacah the wife of Machir bore a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.
korean_text: 마길의 아내 마아가는 아들을 낳아 그의 이름을 베레스라 하였으며 그의 아우의 이름은 세레스이며 세레스의 아들들은 울람과 라겜이요

sentences.original_text: And Maacah the wife of Machir bore a son
and she called his name Peresh
and the name of his brother was Sheresh
and his sons were Ulam and Rakem
